ISSUE.TITLE: Restart app after changing some settings
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 We have some settings, the changed values of which take effect only after restarting, moreover before restarting they can break the correct app work (for example `LocalizationSettings.SeoFriendlyUrlsForLanguagesEnabled`). We should either force restart the app, as we already do for `AppSettings`, or display an appropriate warning to the admin to restart the app manually.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5925 Removed instruction to create empty datasettings.json file in docker

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5654 Added a warning about the need to restart the application when changing setting LocalizationSettings.SeoFriendlyUrlsForLanguagesEnabled
